homepage.testimonial2: Excellent international shipping services. The customs clearance support is invaluable for our business.
homepage.testimonial3: The analytics dashboard provides insights that help us optimize our shipping costs and delivery times.

about.title: About WAHL
about.sub: Leading the logistics industry with innovation, reliability, and exceptional service.
about.our_story_p1: Founded in 1999, WAHL has grown from a small local logistics company to a global leader in supply chain management.
about.our_story_p2: Today, we serve thousands of clients worldwide, managing complex logistics operations with precision and reliability.
about.our_story_p3: We believe in building long-lasting partnerships and delivering customized solutions.
about.timeline_sub: Key milestones that shaped our company and established us as industry leaders.
about.team_sub: Experienced professionals dedicated to exceptional logistics solutions.
about.mission_text: To provide innovative, reliable logistics solutions that empower businesses to succeed.
about.vision_text: To be the world's most trusted logistics partner.

team_member1.name: John Smith
team_member1.bio: With over 25 years in logistics, John founded WAHL with a vision to revolutionize supply chain management.

team_member2.name: Sarah Johnson
team_member2.bio: Sarah brings extensive experience in global logistics operations and supply chain optimization.

team_member3.name: Michael Chen
team_member3.bio: Michael leads our digital transformation initiatives, implementing cutting-edge logistics technology.

team_member4.name: Emily Rodriguez
team_member4.bio: Emily ensures exceptional customer experience and builds lasting relationships with our clients.

timeline_1999.title: Company Founded
timeline_1999.description: WAHL was established with a mission to provide reliable logistics solutions.

timeline_2005.title: Global Expansion
timeline_2005.description: Opened international offices and established global shipping partnerships.

timeline_2012.title: Technology Innovation
timeline_2012.description: Launched proprietary tracking system and digital logistics platform.

timeline_2018.title: Industry Leadership
timeline_2018.description: Recognized as industry leader with multiple awards for excellence.

timeline_2024.title: Sustainability Focus
timeline_2024.description: Implemented green logistics initiatives and carbon-neutral shipping options.

clients_page.title: Our Clients
clients_page.sub: Trusted by leading companies across industries for reliable logistics solutions.

services_page.title: Our Services
services_page.sub: We operate a modern fleet and deliver end-to-end logistics solutions.
services_page.cta_sub: Contact us today to discuss comprehensive logistics solutions.
services_page.ground_desc: Reliable and efficient ground transportation across the country.
services_page.ocean_desc: Comprehensive ocean freight services for international shipping.
services_page.air_desc: Fast and secure air freight services for time-sensitive shipments.
services_page.package_desc: Professional package delivery with careful handling and timely delivery.
services_page.ware_desc: State-of-the-art warehousing with advanced inventory management.
services_page.scm_desc: End-to-end supply chain solutions that optimize operations.
